name: River4
description: River of news aggregator that runs from Amazon S3

s3path.description: The path to the S3 bucket containing subscription list, rivers and data for the aggregator.

AWS_ACCESS_KEY_ID.description: The AWS Access Key ID for accessing the S3 bucket see http://bit.ly/1bIjDah for help.

AWS_SECRET_ACCESS_KEY.description: The AWS Secret Access Key for accessing the S3 bucket see http://bit.ly/1bIjDah for help.

AWS_REGION.description: The AWS Region where the S3 bucket is located, e.g. us-east-1
